attributes.action: No roll out of vaccine passports
attributes.additional_details: We would ask the Government to stop all actions that force or stop people from from attending these events as it is a form of segregation against people who wish to have control over what they would choose to have in their bodies.
attributes.background: As we have heard from September 2021 you will need to show that you have had 2 Covid 19 vaccinations to enter a nightclub or other large gathering. This is against our human rights and individual choice to what we choose medically to have within our own bodies.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
